articles.title: Bodies of all 67 people killed in D.C. aircraft collision recovered, officials say - CNBC
articles.description: The bodies of all 67 people killed in the collision of an American Airlines regional jet with an Army helicopter have been recovered, officials said Tuesday.
articles.content: The remains of all 67 people killed in Wednesday's collision of an American Airlines regional jet and an Army Black Hawk helicopter over the Potomac River have been recovered, officials said Tuesday.… [+3137 chars]
